name: BioLabs: Outbreak!
description:
The outbreak is bad and it must be stopped! Trap the viruses by dispensing antidote cells to confine their movement. They will flail around and use all of their energy until they are finally frozen into place by the antidote.

Unlock all features to play all 40 levels and earn achievements along the way. But be careful not to use up all of your antidote, or else the outbreak will not be stopped!

************

"BioLabs: Outbreak!" was developed by Reflexive Entertainment. Check out Reflexive's other games, including "Airport Mania: First Flight" and "Music Catch"!
